title: The Perfect Stranger
description: Elle has spent her whole life believing in her Perfect Stranger - the man she’ll marry and spend the rest of her life with. A card reading tells her changes are coming and she’s in for a rollercoaster of a ride.Prepared to wait until he comes into her life, Elle keeps herself for that special someone and leads a happy and confident life, but when she meets Oli Wentworth, everything starts to change. He seems to fit the bill, he sings to her soul and calls to her heart.But Oli has a past that becomes Elle’s present.Elle has to decide whether to stay on the rollercoaster and give her vision of love a chance.Is her perfect stranger so perfect after all?Fans of Jojo Moyes ME BEFORE YOU will enjoy the realism of this book - recognising that love isn't always perfect and sometimes huge sacrifices are made in the quest for making a relationship as perfect as it can be. Dealing with some ‘taboo’ topics, THE PERFECT STRANGER demonstrates the complexities of life; weaving them into realistic characters and everyday people, leading you to question how far would you go to make a perfect relationship?
author: Emmie Spencer
